item.description:
The Massachusetts Civil Liberties Task Force is an informal partnership of civil liberties activists working on a variety of projects around the state. People meet once a month at the Boston office of the Massachusetts ACLU to share information and plan campaigns. The CLTF is sponsored by Nancy Murray of the MA ACLU, and is open to anyone who is interested. [Note: Most regular attendees of the CLTF meeting are not meetup.com users, so don't worry if there are few RSVPs here - the meeting is happening and people are coming! ]

Boston ACLU office, 99 Chauncy Street, 3rd floor.

Take the red line to Downtown Crossing, use the Chauncy Street exit (opposite end of the station from the Washington St / Filenes Basement exit). When you emerge onto Chauncy Street, turn right and walk about two blocks to 99, go up to third floor.
item.name: MA Civil Liberties Task Force monthly meeting
